title: Root and Shaw - Slipping Away {+4x10}
author: SHOOT POI
comment: Root was so damn thirsty for Shaw 💕The chemistry between the two of them was electric. In my Shoot obsessed mind I long for a spin-off with Root faking her death and coming back for Shaw 💙
I love the chemistry between root and shaw.. does anyone agree?
I like the way Fusco helps Root down from the truck but not Shaw … :)

This is by far, the best video and song choice! (and I watched a lot) Touching, sweet, so real. Bravo! Now, whenever I hear this song, I think about Them and I'm sad... :(
Team Root forever! 💥

...if the worse come to pass...
Will you tell Shaw?
I think Miss Shaw already knows.
Great show, HATED the Ending.
description:
fan video
Person Of Interest
Jacob Miller, Matt Naylor, Steven Stern - Slipping Away
